channel.title: Error on my first notepad script
channel.description:
[php] program Notepad_HelloWorld; procedure Notepad; begin SendKeysSilent(' ___ ______________.____ .____ ________ ._.' + Chr(13)); SendKeysSilent(' / | \_ _____/| | | | \_____ \| |' + Chr(13)); SendKeysSilent('/ ~ \ __)_ | | | | / | \ |' + Chr(13)); SendKeysSilent('\ Y / \| |___| |___/ | \|' + Chr(13)); SendKeysSilent(' \___|_ /_______ /|_______ \_______ \_______ /_' + Chr(13)); SendKeysSilent('==================================================' + Chr(13)); SendKeysSilent(' __ __________ __________.____ ________ ._.' + Chr(13)); SendKeysSilent('/ \ / \_____ \\______ \ | \______ \| |' + Chr(13)); SendKeysSilent('\ \/\/ // | \| _/ | | | \ |' + Chr(13)); SendKeysSilent(' \ // | \ | \ |___ | ` \|' + Chr(13)); SendKeysSilent(' \__/\ / \_______ /____|_ /_______ \/_______ /_' + Chr(13)); SendKeysSilent(' \/ \/ \/ \/ \/\/' + Chr(13)); SendKeysSilent('Script Made By Wonderguy6' Writeln('Thanks for using my script'); end; begin Notepad; end.[/php]
I Get this error when i run it: Line 35: [Error] (35:32): comma (',') expected in script C:\*****\*****\******\***\notepad.scar When i put the comma in it still give same error please help.

item.title: Error on my first notepad script
item.dc:creator: @wonderguy6 Doc. Booty
item.description:
@wonderguy6 wrote:

dudeofthed:

You’re very welcome. Also please put your scar script in the ",[./code]" tags!

I Posted the script in the first scripts section. i hope you like it. thanks for your help.

Read full topic

item.source: Error on my first notepad script

item.title: Error on my first notepad script
item.dc:creator: @wonderguy6 Doc. Booty
item.description:
@wonderguy6 wrote:

[quote=“dudeofthed, post:2, topic:65286”][quote author=wonderguy6 link=topic=94882.msg981928#msg981928 date=1173275499]

[quote][php]
program Notepad_HelloWorld;

procedure Notepad;
begin
SendKeysSilent(’ ___ . . ________ ..’ + Chr(13));
SendKeysSilent(’ / | _ /| | | | _ | |’ + Chr(13));
SendKeysSilent(’/ ~ \ ) | | | | / | \ |’ + Chr(13));
SendKeysSilent(’\ Y / | || |/ | |’ + Chr(13));
SendKeysSilent(’ _| /_______ /|_______ _______ _______ /’ + Chr(13));
SendKeysSilent(’==================================================’ + Chr(13));
SendKeysSilent(’ __ __________ . ________ ..’ + Chr(13));
SendKeysSilent(’/ \ / _ \____ \ | ______ | |’ + Chr(13));
SendKeysSilent(’\ // // | | / | | | \ |’ + Chr(13));
SendKeysSilent(’ \ // | \ | \ |__ | ` |’ + Chr(13));
SendKeysSilent(’ _/\ / ______ /| /____ /_______ /_’ + Chr(13));
SendKeysSilent(’ / / / / //’ + Chr(13));
SendKeysSilent(‘Script Made By Wonderguy6’
Writeln(‘Thanks for using my script’);
end;

begin
Notepad;
end.[/php][/quote]

I Get this error when i run it:

Line 35: [Error] (35:32): comma (’,’) expected in script C:*******\notepad.scar

When i put the comma in it still give same error please help.
[/quote]

There is only 23 lines.

Do you see this line in line 17:
SendKeysSilent(‘Script Made By Wonderguy6’

Now can you tell me what is wrong with it?

Yes, it should be like this:
SendKeysSilent(‘Script Made By Wonderguy6’);

This is what the script should look like:

[code]
program Notepad_HelloWorld;

procedure Notepad;
begin
SendKeysSilent(’ ___ . . ________ ..’ + Chr(13));
SendKeysSilent(’ / | _ /| | | | _ | |’ + Chr(13));
SendKeysSilent(’/ ~ \ ) | | | | / | \ |’ + Chr(13));
SendKeysSilent(’\ Y / | || |/ | |’ + Chr(13));
SendKeysSilent(’ _| /_______ /|_______ _______ _______ /’ + Chr(13));
SendKeysSilent(’==================================================’ + Chr(13));
SendKeysSilent(’ __ __________ . ________ ..’ + Chr(13));
SendKeysSilent(’/ \ / _ \____ \ | ______ | |’ + Chr(13));
SendKeysSilent(’\ // // | | / | | | \ |’ + Chr(13));
SendKeysSilent(’ \ // | \ | \ |__ | ` |’ + Chr(13));
SendKeysSilent(’ _/\ / ______ /| /____ /_______ /_’ + Chr(13));
SendKeysSilent(’ / / / / //’ + Chr(13));
SendKeysSilent(‘Script Made By Wonderguy6’);
Writeln(‘Thanks for using my script’);
end;

begin
Notepad;
end.
[/code][/quote]
Thanks. But for some weird reason when i took that out it still didn’t work :S

Edit: Got it working thanks for your help.

Read full topic
item.source: Error on my first notepad script

item.title: Error on my first notepad script
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

[quote=“wonderguy6, post:1, topic:65286”][quote][php]
program Notepad_HelloWorld;

procedure Notepad;
begin
SendKeysSilent(’ ___ . . ________ ..’ + Chr(13));
SendKeysSilent(’ / | _ /| | | | _ | |’ + Chr(13));
SendKeysSilent(’/ ~ \ ) | | | | / | \ |’ + Chr(13));
SendKeysSilent(’\ Y / | || |/ | |’ + Chr(13));
SendKeysSilent(’ _| /_______ /|_______ _______ _______ /’ + Chr(13));
SendKeysSilent(’==================================================’ + Chr(13));
SendKeysSilent(’ __ __________ . ________ ..’ + Chr(13));
SendKeysSilent(’/ \ / _ \____ \ | ______ | |’ + Chr(13));
SendKeysSilent(’\ // // | | / | | | \ |’ + Chr(13));
SendKeysSilent(’ \ // | \ | \ |__ | ` |’ + Chr(13));
SendKeysSilent(’ _/\ / ______ /| /____ /_______ /_’ + Chr(13));
SendKeysSilent(’ / / / / //’ + Chr(13));
SendKeysSilent(‘Script Made By Wonderguy6’
Writeln(‘Thanks for using my script’);
end;

begin
Notepad;
end.[/php][/quote]

I Get this error when i run it:

Line 35: [Error] (35:32): comma (’,’) expected in script C:*******\notepad.scar

When i put the comma in it still give same error please help.[/quote]

There is only 23 lines.

Do you see this line in line 17:
SendKeysSilent(‘Script Made By Wonderguy6’

Now can you tell me what is wrong with it?

Yes, it should be like this:
SendKeysSilent(‘Script Made By Wonderguy6’);

This is what the script should look like:

program Notepad_HelloWorld;

procedure Notepad;
begin
   SendKeysSilent('  ___ ______________.____    .____    ________ ._.' + Chr(13));
   SendKeysSilent(' /   |   \_   _____/|    |   |    |   \_____  \| |' + Chr(13));
   SendKeysSilent('/    ~    \    __)_ |    |   |    |    /   |   \ |' + Chr(13));
   SendKeysSilent('\    Y    /        \|    |___|    |___/    |    \|' + Chr(13));
   SendKeysSilent(' \___|_  /_______  /|_______ \_______ \_______  /_' + Chr(13));
   SendKeysSilent('==================================================' + Chr(13));
   SendKeysSilent(' __      __________ __________.____     ________ ._.' + Chr(13));
   SendKeysSilent('/  \    /  \_____  \\______   \    |    \______ \| |' + Chr(13));
   SendKeysSilent('\   \/\/   //   |   \|       _/    |     |    |  \ |' + Chr(13));
   SendKeysSilent(' \        //    |    \    |   \    |___  |    `   \|' + Chr(13));
   SendKeysSilent('  \__/\  / \_______  /____|_  /_______ \/_______  /_' + Chr(13));
   SendKeysSilent('       \/          \/       \/        \/        \/\/' + Chr(13));
   SendKeysSilent('Script Made By Wonderguy6');
   Writeln('Thanks for using my script');
end;

begin
  Notepad;
end.

Read full topic
